sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script will be used  for following operations :
- Run inbound-script on each dependencies and set compliance state accordingly</description>
        <name>Set Compliance state of ISC configs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.glide.instance_sec_center")) {
  var gr = new GlideRecord('isc_security_dependencies');
  gr.query();
  while (gr.next()) {
    var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
    evaluator.evaluateScript(gr, 'harc_inbound_script', null);
  }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-16 17:03:33</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c862c5c18702301001c8de05b7cb0b3d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set Compliance state of ISC configs</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Instance Security Center" source="com.glide.instance_sec_center">387a706c3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f96</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c862c5c18702301001c8de05b7cb0b3d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-16 17:03:33</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set Compliance state of ISC configs
